name: scain
description: Low-cost food traceability MVP with ESP32, blockchain, and web dashboard

scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && cd backend && go fmt ./... && go vet ./...
scripts.clean: rm -f scain-backend && cd backend && go clean
